RELEASE NOTES:  

   NO INSTALL/UNRAR & PLAY    

    When the game is on the line and the ball is in your hands, what will you 
   do? Will you penetrate, drive the lane and rise above the rim for a monster 
   dunk,  or find an opening on  the perimeter and  sink a game-winning three? 
   Take control of the game with a full arsenal to win the one-on-one match-up 
   from every spot on the floor with NBA Live 08.
